TextView.android:text:
Queryz is a sqlite database manager where you can create or open your databases.
 After opening the database you can execute your sqlite commands.
 As you type, you can auto complete your command with sqlite commands or with the name of the tables and columns of the selected database. And also, it's possible to have an overview of the database tables. Every executed command is stored in a historical.


 FEATURES:
Create or open sqlite database
Run sqlite commands
Database overview
Fast typing
History
Export/Import Databases


TIPS:
 Clicking on the column's description at the 'Description' button will copy the column's name to the typing area
Some commands are stored with '!' at the beginning. This mean the command failed
 To drop your database long click on the selected database at the listing
Long click to remove just one item from the history

In case of doubt, suggestions or bugs, please contact us.
